EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-11-02
EmailTemplate.subject: Telstra Teams with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 02, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/telstra-teams-with-pivotal-to-accelerate-transformation-to-move-at-startup-speed?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1509408862?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Telstra Teams with Pivotal to Accelerate Transformation to Move at Startup Speed On Oct. 3, Rob Mee and Andy Penn, CEO of Telstra, spoke at the joint Telstra/Pivotal office in Sydney to celebrate the partnership between Telstra and Pivotal and discuss innovative change happening both at Telstra and with Pivotal customers such as Macquarie Bank, NSW Government, and CoreLogic RP Data. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/telstra-teams-with-pivotal-to-accelerate-transformation-to-move-at-startup-speed?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1509408862?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-internet-of-athletes-playing-the-numbers-game-winning-52c01755e4b2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Why a Personal Brand is Necessary For Today’s Developer Neha Batra explains why personal branding is more than self-promotion. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/why-a-personal-brand-is-necessary-for-todays-developer-f0f18bfaa033?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-internet-of-athletes-playing-the-numbers-game-winning-52c01755e4b2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Internet of Athletes: Playing The Numbers Game & Winning How professional athletes are using data to drive success. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-internet-of-athletes-playing-the-numbers-game-winning-52c01755e4b2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/digging-into-the-dna-of-pivotal-greenplum-5-0-ep-48?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Digging into the DNA of Pivotal Greenplum 5.0 (Ep. 48) Cesar Rojas and Jacque Istok join Jeff to talk about what's new in Greenplum 5.0, including multi-cloud support and even more advanced analytics capabilities. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/digging-into-the-dna-of-pivotal-greenplum-5-0-ep-48?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.glassdoor.com/blog/up-and-coming-companies/?utm_content=buffer18b87&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer]]> 9 Incredible Up-and-Coming Companies to Join Now Glassdoor names Pivotal as one of the most incredible up-and-coming companies to join now. What sets us apart <[[https://www.glassdoor.com/blog/up-and-coming-companies/?utm_content=buffer18b87&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-12-with-jared-ruckle-ep-81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.12, with Jared Ruckle (Ep. 82) Coté and Seroter talk with Jared Ruckle about the new features and updates in Pivotal Cloud Foundry 1.12. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-cloud-foundry-1-12-with-jared-ruckle-ep-81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.oreilly.com/ideas/why-cloud-native-enterprise-security-matters]]> Why Cloud-Native Enterprise Security Matters Matt Stine looks at three principles of cloud-native security and explains an approach that addresses the increasing volume and velocity of threats. Watch Now <[[https://www.oreilly.com/ideas/why-cloud-native-enterprise-security-matters]]> Upcoming Events 11/7 Operationalizing Data Science: The Right Architecture and Tools, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-7-operationalizing-data-science-the-right-architecture-and-tools-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=ops-data-science-2-q417]]>
